name: Renegade Tabletop Tools System
description: The Renegade Tabletop Tools System consists of two powerful, but very easy to use tools to aid in tabletop or net-based role-playing sessions.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows (32-bit/64-bit) Processor: 1.0 GHZ Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics Storage: 50 MB available space Sound Card: Not Required
